What method should I use?        dos.writeUTF("Name");        dos.writeInt(ctr);        dos.flush();        outputRecord = baos.toByteArray();        recordStore.addRecord(outputRecord, 0, outputRecord.length);        recordStore.closeRecordStore();        baos.reset();        baos.close();        dos.close();    }catch(Exception e){}}
